channel.title: Record Commands in Ssh on Digital River

item.title: How To Record Everything You Do In Terminal - OSTechNix
item.description: <img src="/img/2017/03/record-everything-you-do-in-terminal.png" alt=""> Synopsis: script -a my_history mkdir test cd test touch hello_world.txt echo 'Hello World' > ./hello_world.txt # This closes the "script -a my_history" file exit Source: How To Record Everything You Do In Terminal - OSTechNix
